channel.title: [317] 06PRIME Looking for a content developer
channel.description:
06PIME HAS RETURNED
06Prime is looking for 2-3 Content Developer. 06Prime will be an exact 2006-2007 replica. Must Be A Trusted Member
Please understand that the base we're using is Rune-Source. We are one of the most advanced 2006 Remakes and have very high expectations. [s]We will be paying our developers through any left over donations we have after covering the costs of our VPS & Webhost.[/s] Buying and selling of services are not allowed on Moparscape.
BEFORE 06PRIME CLOSED IN MARCH WE AVERAGE 250 PLAYERS.
[code=c]Name: Age: Links to other work: How long have you been working with Java: Skype: How Many hours can you be on: Why we should consider you: Timezone: Have you worked on Runesource before:[/code]

item.title: [317] 06PRIME Looking for a content developer
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

We don’t allow buying or selling of services through moparscape. Feel free to advertise that you are looking for a programmer and once you have their email/skype/whatever you can discuss payments there. We don’t allow our site to be used as a direct avenue for trades.

I edited your post accordingly. You can change it but don’t advertise that you are paying.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] 06PRIME Looking for a content developer
item.dc:creator: @zeropointx zeropointx
item.description:
@zeropointx wrote:

Name: I don't feel like saying that in public
Age: 20
Links to other work: We can discuss this in private
How long have you been working with Java: A few years really active
Skype: zeropointxx
How Many hours can you be on: about 6 hours a day
Why we should consider you: First of all I am very mature. I am also studying game engine programming in school so I know quite a lot about game development and more every month! I have been coding with c++ for about 1 year now as well. I am really independent and I can find/fix most problems by myself.
Timezone: GMT + 2
Have you worked on Runesource before: Can't remember, I have been working with so many sources that I doubt this can be all that different?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] 06PRIME Looking for a content developer

06PIME HAS RETURNED

06Prime is looking for 2-3 Content Developer. 06Prime will be an exact 2006-2007 replica. Must Be A Trusted Member
